question: Rajaram offered the post of Peshwa after Ramchandra Pant Amatyain to which of the following?
explanation: Ramchandra Pant Amatya was the Peshwa under Rajaram till 1698 CE after which Rajaram offered the post of Peshwa to his wife Tarabai, and Ramchandra Pant Amatya happily stepped down. He was given an important position in the senior administration.
